'''"Leisurely Fireworks"''' is a purchasable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. A maximum of 5 can be purchased from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=100}}.

Interacting with it will cause five orange and yellow fireworks to go off after five seconds.

==Notes==
* Activating the device in [[Co-Op Mode]] will only show the fireworks to the player who activated it and not to other players.
